duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize foodservice safety and sanitation principles to prepare patient trays for all diets, delivery and pickup of trays, special requests and needs, in-between meal food delivery, and dish/pot washing.
Communicate with nutrition supervisor, clinical nutrition coordinator, supervisor, and others on the healthcare team.
Provide proper etiquette and excellent customer service for all age groups from infants to elderly and all customers.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree in Nutrition, Dietetics, or a related field
